    LECTURE
    Jeff Wall
    Jan Tumlir, Los Angeles-based art critic
    July 19 at 6:00 p.m.
    Fullerton Hall

    Ian Wallace, Vancouver-based artist
    August 2 at 6:00 p.m.
    Fullerton Hall


    DISCUSSION
    September 20 at 6:00 p.m.
    Price Auditorium
    Chicago area photographers using digital technology—including Ben Gest, Melanie Schiff, and others—discuss its impact on their practice and its applications to the creative process.


    FAMILY PROGRAM
    Special Workshop: Arranging Pictures—The Photography of Jeff Wall
    September 22 from 2:00–3:30
    For ages 6 to 12 with an adult
    Studio 18, Kraft Education Center
    Advanced registration required
    Families will visit the exhibition Jeff Wall to explore the artist's pictures, then make a mixed-media collage with drawings and photographs.


    TEACHER PROGRAMS
    Exploring Photography in a Digital World
    July 18, 19, and 20 from 9:30 am–3:30 p.m.
    Studio 19, Kraft Education Center
    Three-day course for educators. Fee: $200; 15 CPDUs.
    Call (312) 857-7199 for more information or click here
